text: Leopoldo Raúl Guido Moreau (born 5 November 1946) is an Argentine journalist and politician. He was a well known supporter of President Cristina Fernández de Kirchner. He was a member of both houses of the Argentine National Congress from 1983 to 2005, and National Deputy since 2017. He also was President of the Chamber of Deputies 1989. He unsuccessfully ran for President of Argentina in 2003. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1946 births Category:Argentine journalists Category:Presidents of the Argentine Chamber of Deputies Category:People from Rosario, Argentina
title: Leopoldo Moreau
